DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate dextroamphetamine sulfate ( sustained release ) adjunct concurrent cocaine opiate dependent patient .
DOC.detailed_description: This 27-week double-blind , placebo control treatment design evaluate dextroamphetamine sulfate ( sustained release ) adjunct concurrent cocaine opiate dependent patient . All subject receive methadone . For treatment cocaine dependence , subject receive one 2 dos dextroamphetamine ( 15 30mg ) placebo . After 4 week treatment dose level dextroamphetamine double ( 30 60mg ) . This dose maintain 20 week ; subject attend twice weekly visit clinic receive weekly cognitive behavioral therapy . Follow evaluation conduct 3 month post treatment . Subjects assist transfer Houston area methadone clinic maintain treatment opiate dependence follow treatment completion .
